items.sentence: Mary is one of the girls that Tom is interested in.
There are a lot of people that want to talk to Tom.
I\'d really like to know why Tom isn\'t here today.
I\'ll be singing a song at Tom and Mary\'s wedding.
I\'ll never forget what you\'ve done for my family.
I\'m afraid that you\'re sitting in the wrong seat.
Tom will try to find out why Mary wants to do that.
Tom wished he were able to visit Boston more often.
Tom wished that he could spend more time with Mary.
Tom wants Mary to think you\'re a little dangerous.
